U_pale_box.card: Her Heart can hold more quick gifts
U_pale_box.effect: Each radiated Pale Box will expand Her Heart's quick gift storage capacity by one unit.

U_foreign_axon.name: Foreign Axon
U_foreign_axon.memory1: A strange quirk of the Shambles is that they never seem to refer to themselves as an individual.|L||L|"WE are in pain"|L|"OUR hunger is eternal"|L||L|What fascinating creatures!
U_foreign_axon.memory2: I've seen many Shambles exhibiting strange behaviors. It's as if they are reacting to invisible objects. They will suddenly cry out in pain and start bleeding from a random place on their body. It is unclear where these injuries are coming from.
U_foreign_axon.memory3: Yes, this must explain it!|L|Shambles can feel into parallel worlds. Their nerves branch out into a higher dimension! They might even feel themselves as multiple beings. They will never speak as individuals because they are many parallel versions at once!
U_foreign_axon.card: Take an extra gift from the Link Synapse
U_foreign_axon.effect: Each radiated Foreign Axon will allow an extra gift to be taken out of the Link Synapse at the start of a run.

U_sentinel_claw.name: Sentinel Claw
U_sentinel_claw.memory1: Yona was always known for exaggerating her feelings, especially when it came to her love for Waterfall.|L|"My love for you could easily power the world for the next 800 years!"|L|Yona and Waterfall were inseparable. They were going to be together forever.|L||L|Waterfall was born with a weak heart. She needed a transplant, but there weren't any donated hearts available.
U_sentinel_claw.memory2: "Take my heart! I don't need it if you won't be here to share it with me."|L|She pleaded with her, but Waterfall would not take her heart. Her health began to deteriorate, and Yona became desperate. Yona took her own life hoping Waterfall would accept her final gift. Upon hearing the news, Waterfall's own heart finally gave out and she passed away as well.|L||L|Why is this story in Sentinel's files?
U_sentinel_claw.card: Add another round to Sentinel's Quiz
U_sentinel_claw.effect: Each radiated Sentinel Claw will allow you to enter an extra round of Sentinel's Quiz. You will receive an extra reward for each round you complete.

U_clock.name: Clock
U_clock.memory1: Another night of confusing nightmares, but the sun should be rising now. Oh, it's raining again. Well, that's okay!|L||L|I'm going to see if I can find that Little Robot again. She helped me so much yesterday!
U_clock.memory2: The clock says it should be half an hour past noon. This thing sure is useful for cloudy days like this. There is no way to tell where the sun is just by looking.
U_clock.memory3: The sun should be setting by now. It's getting colder and darker. I think I know where I am again.
U_clock.memory4: //Two minutes to midnight|L|[Atmospheric data]|L|Chance of rain: 0.01%|L||L|//This Unit predicts the Zaraden will be pleased tomorrow
U_clock.memory5: //Three minutes past hour four|L|[Atmospheric data]|L|Chance of rain: 100.00%|L||L|//This is an unexpected result
U_clock.card: Bonding Time events have more time
U_clock.effect: Each radiated Clock will add one unit of time to all Bonding Time events.

U_rainbow_petal.name: Rainbow Petal
U_rainbow_petal.effect: Radiated Rainbow Petals allow the Radiant Garden to be upgraded.

U_dream_petal.name: Dream Petal
U_dream_petal.effect: Radiated Dream Petals allow Solara's Gift Shop to be upgraded.
